title: Person of Interest - John's sacrifice (05x13)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: I can say with no doubt this falls in one of the GREATEST shows ever created, a true masterpiece
When I hired you, I suspected you were gonna be a great employee. What I couldn't have anticipated was that you would become such a good friend. (Where men cried)
This ending is better than GOT season 8 ending.

to understand his sacrifice, we need to understand John's character 
through entire series (or just this one episode explain it all)
- John's father died SACRIFICE himself to save 5 people from fire. People called him a HERO, John inspired by him
John was always living on borrowed time.
description:
- Extract from season 5 episode 13
